CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleButtonClickEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local Entity = event.Entity -------------------------------------------------------- if self.statUI.Visible == false then self.statUI.Visible = true elseif self.statUI.Visible == true then self.statUI.Visible = false end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if key == KeyboardKey.Escape then self.statUI.Visible = false end
